title: Ep. 94 - Ice Ice Baby
description:
Pat was out of town for meetings pertaining to his new booth gig with ESPN's Thursday Night College Football, so the boys held it down in his absence. They kicked things off with a phone call to comedian Rich Ragains and then debated the tough topics that other podcasts are afraid to touch. Topics like crushed ice cubes vs, whole cubes, frozen margs vs on-the-rocks, bone-in wings vs boneless, and right side vs left side of the bed. They also played Fact or Fiction and answered 3 outstanding listener questions.
